previous.excerpt: The first reliable all-in-one investing, trading, and saving application. A platform for analyzing and executing on quality information, and then sharing thoughts, research, and profits to any social media platform with a button tap. BETA: http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
previous.title: Aries - Bridging the stock market gap between retail and wall-street

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投资、交易、储蓄于一体的应用。一个对优质信息进行分析和执行的平台，然后通过点击按钮将想法、研究和利润分享到任何社交媒体平台。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
localize.tagline: 缩小散户与墙头草之间的股市差距

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投資、交易、儲蓄於一體的應用。一個對優質信息進行分析和執行的平臺，然後通過點擊按鈕將想法、研究和利潤分享到任何社交媒體平臺。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1

next.excerpt: Yuzu lets anyone build human-in-the-loop business processes without code. We combine powerful automations & integrations with the people-orchestration of a project management tool to keep your processes running to schedule.
next.title: Yuzu - Build complex, human-in-the-loop processes without code

localize.description: Yuzu让任何人都可以在没有代码的情况下建立人在圈内的业务流程。我们将强大的自动化和集成与项目管理工具的人员编排相结合，使您的流程按计划运行。
localize.tagline: 构建复杂的、无需代码的人机交互流程
